409.description: Forum is in use for notifications

parameters.description: Max. number of topics to be returned

parameters.description: Whether to include forums from subprojects

fileId.description: Temporary file id obtained via uploading through file storage API

AttachmentFileEntity.description: Model to describe an uploaded attachment file (for POST and PATCH)

listName.description: Mailing list name associated with this forum

listEnabled.description: Whether the mailing list is enabled or not

footer.description: Custom text to be appended at the bottom of each mail for mailing list

prefix.description: The custom prefix for mail subject

moderated.description: Whether the forum is moderated (MF) or not (UF)

privateForum.description: Whether the forum is private (true) or public (false)

messageSize.description: The maximum size a post/topic including attachments

emailMonitoring.description: This setting determines which users could monitor the forum

emailPosting.description: This setting determines which users could post to the forum

webPosting.description: This setting determines which users could post to the forum via web UI

captcha.description: This indicates for which web posts CAPTCHA is to be enforced

moderators.description: Collection of user ids who can moderate the forum (replaces existing moderators)

trustedUsers.description: Collection of user ids who are trusted users (replaces existing trusted users)
